Console usage

example

example [OPTIONS]

Options

--file-path <file_path>

Path to the original image.

--result-path <result_path>

Path to result image.

--method <method>

Interpolation method: bilinear, nearest_neighbour, bicubic

--scale-factor <scale_factor>

Scale factor SF: new width = SF * width, new height = SF * height
